block.p: A disciplinary committee of the Arkansas Supreme Court recommended that President Clinton be disbarred for ''serious misconduct'' connected to his sworn testimony about his relationship with Monica S. Lewinsky.
Through his lawyers, Mr. Clinton vowed to fight to keep his law license during disbarment proceedings before a state court judge in Little Rock, Ark.

A disciplinary committee of the Arkansas Supreme Court recommended that President Clinton be disbarred for ''serious misconduct'' connected to his sworn testimony about his relationship with Monica S. Lewinsky.
Through his lawyers, Mr. Clinton vowed to fight to keep his law license during disbarment proceedings before a state court judge in Little Rock, Ark.

By mid-week, the presidential pall lifted, as the MCI Center in Washington was packed with 13,625 people, who donated $26.5 million, at the biggest political fund-raiser ever held. Donors gave between $50 and $500,000 each, and the elaborate affair cemented the president's legacy as the most prolific political fund-raiser in the nation's history.
